mapper.select: SELECT NAME,UID FROM usertable WHERE UID=#{value}
SELECT UID,NAME,ACCOUNT,PASSWORD FROM usertable WHERE ACCOUNT = #{ACCOUNT}
SELECT NAME FROM usertable WHERE UID = #{id}

SELECT m.id,m.name,m.parentid,m.iconCls,m.url, (select count(1) from sysmenu s where s.parentId!=0 and s.parentId=m.id) countChildrens FROM sysmenu m
LEFT JOIN role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id LEFT JOIN sysrole r ON rm.role_id = r.id
WHERE m.enable=1
AND r.id=#{sysrole.id}
AND m.id NOT IN( SELECT tt.id FROM (SELECT m.id, (SELECT COUNT(parentId) FROM sysmenu sp WHERE sp.enable=1 AND sp.parentId=m.id AND m.parentId=0 ) countch FROM sysmenu m WHERE m.parentId=0 ) tt where countch =0 ) ORDER BY m.sequence

SELECT count(1) FROM usertable WHERE 1=1
AND NAME LIKE concat('%',#{user.NAME},'%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO usertable ( NAME, SEX, ACCOUNT, PASSWORD, HEADURL, DESCRIPTION, regtime )values( #{NAME}, #{SEX}, #{ACCOUNT}, #{PASSWORD}, #{HEADURL}, #{DESCRIPTION}, #{regtime} )
